price: (15) No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.[1881]
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
footnotes: [1881]- i.e., they will not be able to see Him.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
